body.name: HENCKELS Solution Razor-Sharp 5.5-inch Compact Chef Knife, German Engineered Informed by 100+ Years of Mastery, Stainless Steel
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 4 hrs 27 mins
features: ULTRA-SHARP BLADES: Superior professional-level sharpness that ensures precision cutting.
THE LAST KNIFE YOU’LL EVER NEED TO BUY: German Engineered Knife Informed by over 100 Years of Mastery. HENCKELS knives are built to last.
EFFORTLESS CUTTING: Enjoy easy meal prep and paper-thin cuts with minimal effort with this lightweight, easy-to-use knife.
PERFECT KNIFE: Great for chopping herbs, slicing meat, and dicing vegetables
QUICK CLEAN UP: No-fuss cleanup, in the dishwasher or by hand. Stain and rust-free blades.
WORTH THE SPLURGE: HENCKELS knives start out razor-sharp and stay sharper longer, even with minimal care.
DURABLE BLADE: Single-piece, precision-stamped blade construction provides durability.
STAYS SHARP LONGER: Professional, satin-finished blade boasts precision cutting and is finely honed for long-lasting sharpness
body.description: Since 1895, Henckels International has been making high quality, everyday knives at an exceptional value. Fabricated from high-quality stainless steel, the single-piece, precision-stamped knife blades are lightweight without sacrificing strength and durability. Along with the ergonomic, traditional triple-rivet handle, enjoy maximum maneuverability and fatigue-free cutting. Honed for long-lasting sharpness, the fine-edge blades boast precision cutting. Curved for comfort, the break-proof, triple-rivet handles are pleasant to grip, giving you the control you need to slice through tougher cuts with ease.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Had ordered henckel knives previously and very satisfied , these on the other hand weren’t sharp like the other knives that I had ordered. I wouldn’t order them again !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this knife because I had a Henkel knife I have used for many years; recently although the knife still cut very well, the handle began to disintegrate. I bought the knife that was the same size and description as mine. It will not cut! We tried to sharpen it several times but nothing works! I have put duct tape around the handle of my old knife and will use it until I find a knife that cuts! So disappointed.Update: I contacted the company (after returning the knife and receiving my refund from Amazon) and the company was so gracious and sent me a lovely SHARP knife which I am using gratefully! Problem resolved

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I thought I'd ordered the next size down, but wife loves the knife.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars light weight and sharp
reviews.reviewText: like the shape. handle us made high enough so fingers do not become pinched when cutting

reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I little bit dull

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Perfect. You will reach for this knife more than any other in your kitchen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Was sent a returned knife with fingerprints on it and in a part open package
reviews.reviewText: I thought Henckles was a reputable brand but some how they sent me a used knife in a opened package with a finger print on it. The first thing that bothered me was the two knife tip protectors in the package. Some one is not doing their job. It was obvious this was a return because they taped it up all over with packing tape. This is going back for sure, will look elsewhere for a good utility knife.
